title: Tata Motors says with Curvv.ev it’s bringing price parity between EV and comparable ICE models
description: Tata Motors launched its new EV, the Curvy.ev, on Wednesday, marking its fifth electric vehicle since entering the battery-operated vehicle market in 2020. The SUV coupe features premium segment attributes and is priced at ₹17.49 lakh for the 45kWh battery and ₹19.25 lakh for the 55kWh battery.
